data.text: While its rethinking some biological requirements (blood), perhaps Aldovia could also consider allowing women to hold the throne? #AChristmasPrince
So let me get this right: male blood is all that matters. Got it. #AChristmasPrince
Thus, blood lines are very, very important in matters of succession. #AChristmasPrince
Apparently the coronation ceremony in Aldovia is a marriage to the land. Sacred king, I guess? #AChristmasPrince
Visual cues aren't subtle here. We can recognize the false bride/villain by the fact that she wears red dresses. #AChristmasPrince
When you watch #AChristmasPrince, you won't be disappointed, @KimSnowden73. Lots of #fairytale motifs here!
Oh, I totally look forward to making my mom watch #AChristmasPrince with me over Christmas!
And of course, he interrupts her confession of who she is by kissing her. Classic. #AChristmasPrince
@Ally_Nuttall @diagostinoj LOVE CARRIE FISHER!
Whoa. Plot twist. That's all I'm saying. Spoilers! #AChristmasPrince
Dude, whether you're a prince or a pauper, stealing her cab was NOT funny. It's manspreading of a sort. #AChristmasPrince
Stealing a horse of course turns out badly, with the inevitable frightening encounter with a wolf in the woods. #AChristmasPrince
Aspiring journalist/fake tutor turned horse thief. Got it. As a denizen of NYC, I'm wondering where she learned to ride a horse? #AChristmasPrince

@lindajeanlee I haven't watched A Christmas Prince yet but I am a little obsessed with the holiday romcoms - many of them are filmed in Vancouver which makes it extra fun for me.  So many fairy tales wrapped up in Christmas magic!!!!
Sledding looks fun! But really not looking forward to seeing how they're going to get back uphill. Where are the sit skis when you need them?! #AChristmasPrince

Our plucky heroine has discovered Prince Richard's weakness: the children. If he isn't where he's supposed to be, first look if there are kids nearby. If so, that's where he'll be. Not a selfish jerk, I guess. #AChristmasPrince
I can't look at Queen Helena and NOT see the Borg Queen. #AChristmasPrince

Okay. I like Princess Emily! She pretty quickly figures out that our plucky heroine isn't her new tutor and blackmails her into doing fun things like baking Christmas cookies and writing the truth about her brother. I can respect that. #AChristmasPrince
These royals apparently prize handmade gifts. At least when the late King made them. #AChristmasPrince
Prince Richard's mother is also the Borg Queen! So you are never alone on the holidays, right? #ResistanceIsFutile #AChristmasPrince
Aaaaand there it is. The bonding over how difficult holidays are when one of your parents is dead. #AChristmasPrince
Hmm. Not sure how appropriate it is for our plucky heroine to mine her young charge for the dirt on Prince Richard. #AChristmasPrince

Okay! The Prince Richard cleans up nicely. Our plucky heroine is a bit tongue-tied at the sight of his freshly groomed visage. Come on! Her co-workers showed her a picture of him. He's a 12, remember? #AChristmasPrince
It's immediately revealed that the young princess Emily has Spina Bifida. Because, of course, we need to know what her disability is. #AChristmasPrince
Aaaaand there she goes. Our plucky heroine immediately breaks a priceless Ming vase. And lacks all knowledge of appropriate etiquette for dealing with royals. #AChristmasPrince

@lindajeanlee @Ally_Nuttall My favorite is the ABC Family "12 Dates of Christmas," where a workaholic lady is forced to live the same day over and over Groundhog Day-style until she realizes work/life balance=important. But on each ride through, there's some imagery from the relevant day count in the song.

Oh yes, there he is! The selfish jerk is indeed the missing Prince Richard. But he loves his little sister (who has a visible disability), just in case we needed overt signaling that he's not such a selfish jerk. #AChristmasPrince

Oh noes! No interviews with the prince, no rescheduled press conferences! What's our plucky heroine to do? Sneak into the castle, of course, and be mistaken for the princess's new tutor. Setting up a #bigmis romance plot? #AChristmasPrince

@lindajeanlee @hallmarkchannel When my parents were in town for Thanksgiving, we watched a ton of Hallmark channel movies. In one of them, the woman asked, oh, is that so and so from high school who left town? D replied, "Ah, yes, I was wondering when the future husband would show up." 😂

I've read enough romance novels, and watched enough @hallmarkchannel movies, to guess that the "selfish jerk" who steals the heroine's taxicab is likely our missing prince. Pretty sure this is foreshadowing. #AChristmasPrince
Also, her coworkers ragging on her about her current lack of love life is tired. They all seem overly invested in whether she has a date. #AChristmasPrince

Our plucky heroine needs inspiring pep-talk from her widower dad, who encourages her to take the potentially career-boosting assignment that will leave him alone over the holidays. Not sure my folks would be so understanding. #AChristmasPrince
